title: Web connections need tooling to paste in username and password
author: skewty
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
Create a web connection with username, domain and password.
Start connection. Web page displays.
Easy way to paste in username, password stored in connection.

## Current Behavior
- username, password and domain fields seem inert on web connections

## Possible Solution
Right click menu of tab should contain entries for:
- `Paste username`
- `Paste username@domain`
- `Paste password`

Versio...
